name: Wireless Headphones
LongDescription: Noise-cancelling over-ear wireless headphones with deep bass. Ideal for travel, gaming, and work-from-home environments. Enjoy up to 30 hours of battery life on a single charge.

name: Smartwatch
LongDescription: Waterproof smartwatch with heart rate and fitness tracking. Comes with sleep analysis, message notifications, and 7-day battery backup.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with deep bass.
LongDescription: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 12-hour battery life. Delivers powerful sound with deep bass; perfect for parties and outdoor activities.

name: Gaming Mouse
description: RGB gaming mouse with high precision.
LongDescription: Ergonomic gaming mouse with RGB lighting and 7 programmable buttons. Built for high-speed gaming performance with adjustable DPI up to 6400.

name: Laptop Stand
LongDescription: Aluminum adjustable laptop stand with ventilation holes. Helps maintain correct posture and reduce neck strain. Suitable for 10â€“17 inch laptops.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical keyboard with wrist rest.
LongDescription: RGB mechanical keyboard with blue switches and wrist rest. Ideal for gaming and typing with tactile feedback and customizable lighting modes.

name: Fitness Tracker Band
description: Fitness band for sleep and step tracking.
LongDescription: Lightweight fitness tracker with sleep and step monitoring. Tracks calories, heart rate, and distance; syncs with Android & iOS devices.

name: USB-C Charger
LongDescription: Fast charging USB-C wall adapter with 30W power output. Compatible with phones, tablets, and laptops. Built-in safety protections included.

name: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
LongDescription: Compact true wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation. Offers touch controls, voice assistant, and IPX4 water resistance for workouts.

name: Smart LED Bulb
description: Color-changing smart bulb with voice control.
LongDescription: Color-changing smart LED bulb compatible with Alexa & Google. Set schedules, dim brightness, or change colors using voice commands or app.
